title: How to delete pre-installed Addons
content:
I dont want to only disable those addons/plugins, i want to completly delete them. When i klick manage, i can only enable, disabled, and change update settings. What reason is there those addons can't be deleted by default? Not everyone wants google...

-see attached screenshot
creator: Firefox_Beginner

title: How to prevent AdBlocker from leaking?
content:
I did the test at https://test.amiunique.org/?consent=1 and as a result got this: 16 potentially detected lists (over 292) - These filter lists will be used to generate an unique identifier. -see attached screenshot

Also, if any website of your choice creates a unique identifer on me by using the filter list, as long as i use the exact same filters as another person, could it be that the uniqure identififer is the same for me and the other person or a group of many persons/devices using this exact filter list? I mean.. if my list is the same as someone else they will be identically which means it doesn't matter i am unique identifyed because after all im not unique but only in a list of devices using a specific filter?

And i must say that now, if you go to https://test.amiunique.org and do the test, then klick the shield icon, how pathethic is that amount of trackers, social media trackers, and even cryptominers!?!?
creator: Firefox_Beginner

title: How to automatically block Canvas?
content:
Some of the Support-Members here already know im using privacy.resistFingerprinting - true. Now, each time im visiting a website im being asked to block or allow fingerprinting. How can i set this so it will always auto-block canvas?

-see attached screenshot
creator: Firefox_Beginner

title: Google NOT my default search engine
content:
I have my default search engine set to Bing. All of a sudden, today when I type a search in the address, I get redirected to what I initially thought was google homepage. So I went to my settings & removed google as a search option. No change; still be redirected to google homepage. after looking at the site more closely, I realized it was 

            https://www.google.com/webhp

Now I need help in getting rid of this. And how did I get it in the first place.
creator: rjuneau

title: Extension to view Seller-Company or Country? (boycott made in china)
content:
Any way to show which company or country i am buying a product from? My best bet would be an extension?

This is important because i want to see if i buy a made in china produt so that i can boycott it. If we keep buying made in china, privacy, freedom, and democracy are in great danger.
creator: Firefox_Beginner

title: Firefox keeps re-installing
content: Every time I uninstall firefox through windows file explorer or whatever it always ends up re-installed. I am just asking if anyone knows of a fix to uninstall it and never see it again. Everything that I have seen as a possible fix hasn't worked but even if I have tried it I will try again if you recommend it to me, so feel free with any suggestions
